pullRequest.title: Deprecate SystemUtil.join
pullRequest.bodyText:
System.join's added functionality over UtilPlume.join (handling null arguments) is never used.
More generally, it is a goal to use libraries rather than re-inventing them:
JDK > Guava > plume-lib > local re-implementations
Merge with typetools/checker-framework-inference#167

commit.message: Don't permit arguments to join to be null

nodes.bodyText: This dependency needs to be added to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/dataflow-pom.xml.  (Once we start using the Maven publish gradle plugin, the pom file will be automatically generated and we won't have to do this.)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 dependencies {
     implementation project(':javacutil')
     implementation project(':checker-qual')
+    implementation 'org.plumelib:plume-util:1.1.5'

nodes.bodyText: This dependency needs to be added to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/framework-test-pom.xml.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,8 @@ dependencies {
     implementation project(':javacutil')
     implementation project(':checker-qual')
 
+    implementation 'org.plumelib:plume-util:1.1.5'

nodes.bodyText: Just to be clear, do NOT add this to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/checker-pom.xml.  That is the pom file for the fat jar that includes all dependencies.
